body:
`libtool` is not always generated only directly under `build_directory`.
Therefore, search for `libtool` that exists in the lower directory and patch it in the same way.

This fix is an extension of the following pull request:
https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/12004
FYI, @NickRF @homerdin
title: Fixed to patch libtool existing in the lower directory.
